top_categories.workout_context: Chino Grinder's High desert gravel, Arizona grasslands forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 62 miles.
Chino Grinder's Arizona high desert gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
When someone attacks on Arizona high desert gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Chino Grinder's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before October.
At Chino Grinder, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Chino Grinder. Train it until it feels boring.
62 miles on Arizona high desert gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
Base fitness for Chino Grinder. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.
Varied gradients on Arizona high desert gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Chino Grinder, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Long rides with hard efforts mixed in. Simulates what Chino Grinder's Arizona high desert gravel actually does to you.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Chino Grinder’s 62 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Chino Grinder. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Chino Grinder requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on arizona high desert gravel to build confidence. Expect: high desert gravel, arizona grasslands, desert terrain.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, TT Threshold, and VO2max to prepare you for 62 miles of arizona high desert gravel in Chino Valley, Arizona.
